roleset.name: walk emphatically

example.name: with direction
example.text: `` How many times have I told you [] '' -- he began [*T*-2], and was almost glad when she cut him off [*T*-3] -- `` Too many times '' ! ! -- and flounced to the sink , where she began noisily [*-4] to wash her hands [*T*-5] .
example.arg: the sink , where she began noisily [*-4] to wash her hands [*T*-5]

roleset.note: FLOUNCE-V NOTES: Framed by Ben. (from flounce.01-v)
